message: Cleaned and pinned requirements; Streamlit updated to 1.38.0; added streamlit-autorefresh 1.0.1; verified clean install in fresh venv.

data.reasoning: Pin versions to ensure resolver stability and Python 3.9 compatibility; 1.38.0 satisfies fragments/run_every requirement >=1.37.
data.notes: Previously had unpinned streamlit-autorefresh and Streamlit constraint >=1.41,<2; now pinned and compatible.
